info.description: This is the API to interact with Equipment database
info.title: Equipment API

get.description: get all device types from the database

post.description: create device type for the database

get.description: get device type by ID from the database

patch.description: update device type by name ID from the database
patch.summary: update device type by name ID

patch.description: update device type by status ID from the database
patch.summary: update device type by status ID

get.description: get all equipment with manufacturers from the database

parameters.description: set to true to get all equipment, otherwise only active equipment is returned
parameters.name: all

get.description: get equipment by device id and manufacturer id from the database
get.summary: get equipment by device id and manufacturer id

parameters.description: set to true to get all equipment, otherwise only active equipment is returned
parameters.name: all

get.description: get equipment by device id from the database

parameters.description: set to true to get all equipment, otherwise only active equipment is returned
parameters.name: all

get.description: get equipment by auto_id from the database
get equipment by manufacturer id from the database

parameters.description: set to true to get all equipment, otherwise only active equipment is returned
parameters.name: all

get.description: get equipment by serial number from the database

patch.description: update equipment serial number in the database

get.description: get equipment like serial number from the database

parameters.description: set to true to get all equipment, otherwise only active equipment is returned
parameters.name: all

get.description: get equipment by manufacturer id like serial number and device id from the database
get.summary: get equipment by manufacturer id like serial number and device id

parameters.description: set to true to get all equipment, otherwise only active equipment is returned
parameters.name: all

get.description: get equipment by device id and serial number from the database
get.summary: get equipment by device id and serial number

get.description: get equipment by manufacturer id and serial number from the database
get.summary: get equipment by manufacturer id and serial number

get.description: get equipment by manufacturer id and serial number and device id from the database
get.summary: get equipment by manufacturer id and serial number and device id

patch.description: update equipment status in the database

get.description: get all manufacturers from the database
get a manufacturer by ID from the database

patch.description: update a manufacturer name by ID from the database
patch.summary: update a manufacturer name by ID

patch.description: update a manufacturer status by ID from the database
patch.summary: update a manufacturer status by ID

models.DeviceType.description: DeviceType is a struct for device type

id.description: ID is an int32 for device type id

name.description: Name is a string for device type name

status.description: Status is a string for device type status either active or inactive

models.Equipment.description: Equipment is a struct for equipment

auto_id.description: AutoID is an int32 for equipment auto id

device_type_id.description: DeviceTypeID is an int32 for device id

manufacturer_id.description: ManufacturerID is an int32 for manufacturer id

serial_number.description: SerialNumber is a string for equipment serial number

status.description: Status is a string for equipment status either active or inactive

models.JsonResponse.description: JsonResponse is a struct for response JSON message

Action.description: Action is a string for response action

MSG.description: Message is an interface for response message can be string, models.DeviceType, models.Manufacturer, models.Equipment

Status.description: Status is a string for response status

models.Manufacturer.description: Manufacturer is a struct for manufacturer

id.description: ID is an int32 for manufacturer id

name.description: Name is a string for manufacturer name

status.description: Status is a string for manufacturer status either active or inactive
